Record.Value: Grow potatoes in space with the Hydroponics tutorial.

{THING:DynamicHydroponics} are great for setting up temporary food sources. They're light and portable, but aren't equipped with a lighting system due to weight requirements.
This means the {THING:DynamicHydroponics} must be in a sun-lit spot for plants to grow.
Insert the water canister into the base of the {THING:DynamicHydroponics}
Plant a {THING:ItemPotato} in any of the {THING:DynamicHydroponics} planting slots.
Wait for the plant to grow. Note: We have sped up the plant's growth rate for this tutorial.

The {THING:DynamicHydroponics} is good for starting out, but you will soon want to upgrade to a {THING:StructureHydroponicsStation}. It has built-in UV lights and a pipe import to help with automating the system.
Place the {THING:ItemKitHydroponicStation} in the highlighted position.
Tank connectors are used to connect a {THING:DynamicGasCanisterWater} to pipe networks, which can be used to transport gas and water.
Place the {THING:StructureTankConnector} in the highlighted position.

To attach a {THING:DynamicGasCanisterWater} to a {THING:ItemTankConnector}, place the {THING:DynamicGasCanisterWater} on top of the {THING:ItemTankConnector} and connect it using a {THING:ItemWrench}.
Use the {THING:ItemWrench} to connect the {THING:DynamicGasCanisterWater} to the {THING:ItemTankConnector}.
Use the blue pipes to connect the {THING:ItemTankConnector} to the {THING:StructureHydroponicsStation}. Water will flow into the unit until the {THING:DynamicGasCanisterWater} is empty.
Place the {THING:StructurePipeStraight} in the highlighted position.
{THING:ItemKitCompositeFloorGrating} are a great way to hide away floor-mounted pipe and wires. It also allows for better movement while walking around your base.
Pick up the {THING:ItemKitCompositeFloorGrating} from the crate.
Place the {THING:StructureCompositeFloorGrating} in the highlighted position.
You can now turn on the new {THING:ItemKitHydroponicStation} and plant your {THING:ItemPotato}. It has built-in lights that will keep your plants happy even in low-light conditions.
You have now become self-sufficient with a steady source of food! Now let the {THING:ItemPotato} plant grow until it's ready to harvest.
Wait for the {THING:ItemPotato} plant to fully grow.
